name: Classic Beef Burger
description: Juicy grilled beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Traditional Italian pizza with mozzarella, tomato, and fresh basil.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and aromatic spices.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy pasta with parmesan, eggs, and crispy bacon.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection with lemon butter sauce.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
description: Tender chicken wings tossed in smoky BBQ sauce.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: Stir-fried rice with fresh seasonal vegetables and soy sauce.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Cheesy pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Spicy marinated chicken roasted in a traditional tandoor oven.

name: Cheese Omelette
description: Fluffy eggs with melted cheese, served with toast.

name: Fish & Chips
description: Golden fried fish fillet with crispy fries and tartar sauce.

name: Beef Steak
description: Tender grilled beef steak served with mashed potatoes.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Refreshing strawberry shake topped with whipped cream.

name: Sushi Platter Deluxe
description: A colorful assortment of fresh sushi rolls with salmon, tuna, and avocado.

name: Cheesy Nachos Supreme
description: Crispy nachos loaded with melted cheese, jalapenos, and salsa.

name: Ramen Bowl Special
description: Japanese-style ramen noodles with soft-boiled egg, pork, and miso broth.

name: Shawarma Wrap
description: Tender chicken wrapped in pita bread with garlic sauce and fresh veggies.

name: Falafel Platter
description: Crispy falafel served with hummus, pita bread, and salad.

name: Loaded Fries
description: Golden fries topped with cheese, crispy bacon, and ranch dressing.

name: Thai Green Curry
description: Spicy Thai curry with coconut milk, chicken, and green chili paste.

name: Dim Sum Basket
description: Assorted steamed dumplings filled with shrimp, pork, and vegetables.

name: Mediterranean Platter
description: A mix of hummus, tabbouleh, olives, pita, and grilled meat skewers.

name: Taco Trio
description: Three Mexican-style tacos filled with beef, chicken, and veggies.
